metadata.title: CVE-2017-7551 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
389-ds-base version before 1.3.5.19 and 1.3.6.7 are vulnerable to password brute-force attacks during account lockout due to different return codes returned on password attempts.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-7551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
python3-lib389 - 1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1').
